p: In the current study, 37 patients, 20 women and 17 men, were divided into 3 groups; A (n=16), B (n=5) and C (n=16), constituting people of both genders with ages between 18 and 70 years. Patients were invited based on clinical history and slit lamp examination, where they were examined prior to initiation of treatment and at the end of the study, being followed up every 3 days.
